Letters: Sewage on Auckland harbour beaches a disgrace; Norway v New Zealand; and Cop28 a copout https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-sewage-on-auckland-harbour-beaches-a-disgrace-norway-v-new-zealand-and-cop28-a-copout/HBCZBV4K3VAJ5DET3IKYL7DKRY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-sewage-on-auckland-harbour-beaches-a-disgrace-norway-v-new-zealand-and-cop28-a-copout/HBCZBV4K3VAJ5DET3IKYL7DKRY/ Opinion: 'What an indictment of successive Auckland councils ...'Wed, 03 Jan 2024 16:00:00 +0000 "Have we forgotten the disastrous summer outbreaks of life-destroying and limb-paralysing viral poliomyelitis around 73 years ago was spread by similar contamination of our beaches?"
